name: Rusty Retriever (Gavitchos)
description:
Have you missed your old Gameboy? Feel like having that last slice of pizza for dinner, but don’t remember where did you put it? Rusty Retriever is an arcade game that may be a solution for your problems! In the game you’re a mole, in a duty of collecting old objects from the junkyard and retrieving them to some happy (but cranky) workers. Find the missed objects while you still have time!

Press Space Bar to Grab and Drop the objects. Move your character with W A S D keys. Press E to Spread it all around! Have fun!

Gabriel Ramos - Programmer/GD
Fernando Gavinhos - Programmer
Aron Lopes - Programmer/sound Manager/ Tech Artist/ Level design
Luiz Petronilho - Artist/Tech artist/GD
Carol Carvalho - Artist/Designer

Special credits: Xoão, Kevin Mcleod, Pedro Paulo, Lilly, Maria Julia, Sau, Carol’s parents-in-law

Music:
Hustle by Kevin MacLeod Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3890-hustle License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
Wallpaper by Kevin MacLeod Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4604-wallpaper License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
